recipe.title: Seared Sea Scallops with Crème Fraîche and Caviar
ingredients: 12 large sea scallops, cut horizontally into 2 rounds
1/4 cup crème fraîche or sour cream
instructions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Season scallops with salt and pepper. Cook scallops until golden on bottom, about 2 minutes. Turn over; sauté until just cooked through, about 1 minute. Drain on paper towels. Cool to room temperature.
Top each scallop with 1/2 teaspoon crème fraîche. Top with caviar. Garnish with chives and serve.
